DOC.brief_summary: This study assess the safety/tolerability, PK/PD of LCZ696 in patients with stable heart failure.
DOC.brief_title: Safety/Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics (PK/PD) of LCZ696 in Patients With Stable Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: Patients with documented heart failure (NYHA class IIIV) Use of both ACEi and ARB, ACEi and DRI, ARB and DRI treatment, or all three medications at Screening
